backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing video sessions, segments, their statuses, and retrieval/update APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing multiple frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling prompt input, clip generation workflow, and Grok API initialization.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: App layout component providing header, theming toggle, background image, and footer.
Mobile‑optimized bottom action bar rendering a single large CTA button.
frontend/src/components/ClipSegmentsList: Displays generation progress, per‑clip statuses, previews, and error handling for video segments.
frontend/src/components/ClipVideoPreview: Shows a video preview with error handling and retry support for failed loads.
frontend/src/components/ComposedVideoPre: Manages video composition status, errors, progress, and downloads for composed or individual clips.
frontend/src/components/ErrorNotice.tsx: Displays an error alert with optional retry and start-over actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileStepper.ts: Renders a four-step mobile progress indicator for the prompt-to-download workflow.
frontend/src/components/PromptComposer.t: Provides UI for editing prompts, durations, reference images, and Grok runtime configuration.
frontend/src/components/ReferenceImageUp: Handles reference image selection, validation, preview management, and removal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, supporting login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveGenerationProg: Tracks clip-generation progress with a ticking animation and returns computed progress and status labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching a video session or a user's sessions from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state, applies the theme to the document, and persists it to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoProvider.ts: Returns the active video provider and tracks whether Grok is correctly configured, updating on runtime config changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSession.ts: Manages video generation sessions, including creating sessions, generating clips, updating statuses, and handling errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm coral-themed design system with light and dark mode variables and mobile-friendly adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Implements a robust video download utility handling blob and remote URLs, extension inference, and error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/duration.ts: Provides duration utilities for validating, calculating, and splitting clip durations with tolerance rules.
frontend/src/lib/fileEncoding.ts: Provides functions to convert image files to base64 and batch‑encode multiple images with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/grokEndpoint.ts: Validates and normalizes Grok API endpoints, including canonical endpoint handling and quick format checks.
frontend/src/lib/grokRuntimeConfig.ts: Loads, saves, validates, and manages Grok runtime config in localStorage with change notifications and legacy endpoint detection.
frontend/src/lib/referenceImages.ts: Defines image validation rules and helper utilities for formatting filenames, file sizes, and generating preview URLs.
frontend/src/lib/videoCompose.ts: Checks browser composition capability and simulates multi‑clip composition, returning a clip URL with progress updates.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Validates video URLs via HEAD requests or video element loading and checks clip data structure integrity.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/providers/grokProvider.ts: Retrieves Grok configuration and handles video generation requests, including endpoint validation, image encoding, API calling, and response validation.
frontend/src/providers/videoProvider.ts: Exposes Grok-based video generation functions and defines the ClipData structure, always using Grok as the provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, plugin setup, and extensive theme extensions for colors, typography, and layout.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the Grok-powered video generation app.
